name: Desktop Tree
description: Place a pet tree on your desktop and watch it growing every day.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: The transparent feature is only supported on Vista and above with DWM (Desktop Window Manager) enabled. Transparency might not work on classic theme / basic version of the OS, or using remote desktop.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: The transparent feature is only supported on Vista and above with DWM (Desktop Window Manager) enabled. Transparency might not work on classic theme / basic version of the OS, or using remote desktop.
